entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Dorion

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
